cinnamon.engine.utils

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.Vector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copier<Vector>, Position, Repositionable

    public final class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repositionable, Copier<Vector>

    Three dimensional vector.

    Some arithmetic operations can be chained, as shown below.

         
     final Vector vector = new Vector(2f, 2f, 0f);

     // Final vector = (1f, 1f, -0f)
     vector.subtract(new Vector(5f, 5f, 0f)).add(new Vector(2f, 2f, 0f)).multiply(-1f);

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)

        Comparison between two coordinates of Float.NaN are treated as true and no distinction is made between positive and negative zeros. Floating point comparison is exact (delta of 0).

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the vector with which to compare.
        Returns:
        true if the given object is a vector and both vectors refer to the exact same coordinates.
